author: abdoulline
body:
#### PR description:

(1) update of HB/HE ZeroSuppression (ZS) MC algo for >= Run3 to use only 1 "sliding" TS 
     to match coming HCAL detector firmware update;
(2) removal of obsolete code from SimCalorimetry/HcalZeroSuppressionProducers.

Expected changes: 
(i) reduction of Run3 HB/HE occupancy, actual ZS threshold from DB conditions (unchanged) becomes effectively higher for 1TS algo,  the threshold will be re-adjusted later.  
(ii) Very low-e part of HB and HE RecHits spectra (below 0.2-0.3 GeV) is reduced for HB/HE >= Run3,  but with virtually no effect on high-level Reco.  
 - no effect on HB/HE for Run1/Run2 eras,  
 - no effect on HF/HO for any era.  

Slides from HCAL DPG meeting Feb.14 2020:
https://indico.cern.ch/event/884638/contributions/3728041/attachments/1987193/3311657/ZS_1TS_MC_update_S.A.Feb14_2020.pdf

#### PR validation:

TheMatrix.py -l limited is OK

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

No backport needed.
title: HCAL: Updating HBHE Zero Suppression algo for Run3 MC
